p: In order to find out the possible relationships between common compounds and two kinds of activities, a linear regression analysis was carried out between percentages and IC 50 values. Our results showed that ( Figure S2) only caryophyllene oxide peak area percentages showed remarkably strong negative correlation coefficients with IC 50 of NO inhibition (R 2 = 0.959), Hep3B (R 2 = 0.918), and Hela (R 2 = 0.980) cytotoxicity. These results suggested the possible important contribution of caryophyllene oxide on the anticancer activity and anti-inflammatory effects of Herba Siegesbeckiae essential oil.
